src:
Zajedno za Srbiju: Stvaranje ujedinjene DS nije cilj već sredstvo do dodjemo do pristojne zemlje

06 Nov 2019, 15:10

Stranka Zajedno za Srbiju ocenila je danas da stvaranje ujedinjene Demokratske stranke "nije cilj već sredstvo da dodjemo do pristojne zemlje".Navodeći da stvaranje ujedinjene DS "nije pitanje rokova i sitnog političkog računa", iz Zajedno za Srbiju su ocenili da je cilj da se dodje do stranke "koja će gradjane Srbije pozvati u zajedničku borbu za dobar, civilizovan život"."Zajedno za Srbiju pitanje stvaranja velike ujedinjene Demokratske stranke doživljava kao opredeljenje da idemo u korak sa potrebama društva, tako što ćemo stvoriti snažnu prozapadnu opciju, koja će uz podršku gradjana i svih segmenata društva napraviti modernu zemlju", stoji u saopštenju.Ocenjuje se da su potrebne "nove politike i novi ljudi kao i normalan finansijski život stranke kao tehnički preduslov za definitivno ujedinjenje"."Paralelno sa procesom ujedinjenja DS, za nas je najviši prioritet borba za stvaranje uslova da imamo normalan politički život, a to ćemo ostvariti kroz kampanju bojkota zajedno sa svim partnerima iz opozicije i gradjanima koji protestuju", navodi se u saopštenju Zajedno za Srbiju.
text:
Together for Serbia: Creating a united DS is not a goal, but a means of reaching a decent country

06 Nov 2019, 15:10

Together for Serbia assessed today that the creation of a united Democratic Party "is not a goal but a means to get to a decent country". Stating that creating a united DS "is not a matter of deadlines and a small political bill", Together for Serbia said that the goal was to comes to a party "that will call on the citizens of Serbia to work together for a good, civilized life." "Together for Serbia, the issue of creating a large united Democratic Party is perceived as a commitment to keep up with the needs of society by creating a strong pro-Western option that will with the support of citizens and all segments of society to make a modern country, "the statement said. It is estimated that" new policies and new people are needed as well as the normal financial life of the party as a technical precondition for definitive unification. " the highest priority is the struggle to create the conditions for us to have a normal political life, and we will achieve this through the campaign of struggle "together with all opposition partners and protesting citizens," Together for Serbia said in a statement.
